title: Linxup: Sales Analysis
description: A capstone project with Linxup, a vehicle tracking solutions company, to segment customers using historical sales data for targeted marketing campaigns and, to promptly identify timelines for potential upsell opportunities.

title: Image Forgery Detection using Deep Learning
description: Detecting image splicing and copy-move forgery using deep learning to combat misinformation and cyber threats.

title: Impact of Mental Health on Academic Performance
description: This project explores mental health trends among students using multiple survey datasets and visualizes the insights using a Power BI dashboard.

title: NYC Buildings
description: APower BI Dashboard detailing building permits, violations, and construction trends to support urban development and regulatory compliance.
